trans-unit.source: An abstract base class for correlation initializers that are used to tell the runtime what protocol is being used for the correlation.
trans-unit.target: 特定相关初始值设定项的抽象基类，这些初始值设定项用于通知运行时相关要使用的协议。

trans-unit.source: The runtime uses the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A> for correlation if it is present, otherwise the **CorrelatesWith** property of the messaging activity will be used.
trans-unit.target: 运行时使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A>关联不存在，否则如果**CorrelatesWith**将使用消息传递活动的属性。

trans-unit.source: If both are absent, the ambient handle provided by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> or the workflow service is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果二者都不存在，则将使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> 提供的环境句柄或工作流服务。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle" /> argument for the correlation initializer.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置相关初始值设定项的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle" /> 参数。

trans-unit.source: The runtime uses the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A> for correlation if it is present, otherwise the **CorrelatesWith** property of the messaging activity will be used.
trans-unit.target: 运行时使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A>关联不存在，否则如果**CorrelatesWith**将使用消息传递活动的属性。

trans-unit.source: If both are absent, the ambient handle provided by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> or the workflow service is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果二者都不存在，则将使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> 提供的环境句柄或工作流服务。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to specify the correlation initializer in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendReply> activity.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何在 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendReply> 活动中指定相关初始值设定项。
